name: CITY OF NATSUDO 夏戸市
description:
CITY OF NATSUDO　夏戸市

Explore a miniature Tokyo-area city on lockdown by the yakuza, as a turf-war is imminent. You just want to get into the train station to get to class, so you sweet-talk your way through yakuza and get special permission to leave the city.

The fictional Natsudo-shi is based on real-life Matsudo-shi located in Chiba prefecture, in the greater Tokyo area.

Made in GB Studio. All art created by me. Japanese support from here.

Made for CMI 4301 (Introduction to Game Development) at Texas Tech University.
